00020 #include <stdarg.h>
00021 using namespace std;
00022 
00023 #include "logfile.h"
00024 
00025 namespace Logging {
00026 
00027 enum LogFileOptions { NORMAL = 0, TIMESTAMP_ON_FILENAME = 1, APPEND = 2 };
00028 
00029 LogFile::LogFile(const string& fileName, LogFileOptions options)
00030 {
00031     fs.open(fileName.c_str(), (options & APPEND ? ios::app : ios::trunc));
00032 }
00033 
00034 LogFile::~LogFile()
00035 {
00036     fs.close();
00037 }
00038 
00039 void LogFile::logPrintf(const char* printfFormat, ...)
00040 {
00041     #define BUFSIZE 1024
00042     char buf[BUFSIZE + 1];
00043     
00044     va_list ap;
00045     va_start(ap, printfFormat);
00046     vsnprintf(buf, BUFSIZE, printfFormat, ap);
00047     va_end(ap);
00048 
00049     fs << string(buf) << endl;
00050 }
00051 
00052 } // namespace
